thread.title: Russian FM Spokeswoman Slams Ukraine for Blocking UN Statement on Russian Envoy
thread.title_full: Russian FM Spokeswoman Slams Ukraine for Blocking UN Statement on Russian Envoy

title: Russian FM Spokeswoman Slams Ukraine for Blocking UN Statement on Russian Envoy
text:
Russian FM Spokeswoman Slams Ukraine for Blocking UN Statement on Russian Envoy Â© AP Photo/ Seth Wenig Get short URL 0 13 0 0 On Tuesday, Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova slammed on her Facebook page Ukraine's decision to block the adoption by the UN Security Council statement dedicated to the late Russian ambassador Vitaly Churkin. "This is the real essence of the current Ukrainian authorities: they cannot do anything well, they only spoil everything for everyone, even for themselves," Zakharova said . 
Russian ambassador to the UN Vitaly Churkin passed away on Monday, February 21, in New York. Churkin had served as Russia's permanent representative to the UN and the Russian representative in the UN Security Council from April 2006. The diplomat would have turned 65 on Tuesday, February 21. ...
